Reviews.Title: “Will be returning”
Reviews.Author: beachl0ver1981
Reviews.Content: My family and I stay at the Serene Hotel and Suites everytime we go down to OCMD. We have never had a problem with the service. There were a few stains on the floor but that is to be excepted when traveling with a pet. I would say that the hotel is to be excepted with the price you are paying.

Reviews.Title: “Not even fit to be a no star hotel”
Reviews.Author: DavidVelvet
Reviews.Content: We stayed for about 30 minutes. Checked in around 12:30 am. Climbed the steps covered with trash past the overflowing dumpster to our scenic room overlooking the alley. Managed to get the lock to work to open the door, turned on the light and watched a roach run out of the room!! Stepped inside to the smell of dog urine, a corner shelf falling down, paint covered couch, plaster peeling off of the ceiling and I do not know even what on the toilet seat. I wish I was making all of this up but not even my imagination is that good. Teenaged girl on the front desk was no help, so we left for another hotel. Came back the next morning to get the rest of my stay refunded. Told the assistant manager all of this and his only comment was, " well, we are only a 2 star hotel and you got a good rate"!! Really?? Never again.

Reviews.Title: “horrible,the worst”
Reviews.Author: shuebear
Reviews.Content: When we checked in I was suppose to get vouchers but they didn't have them,the assistant manager said he would have them in the morning.I said o.k..Then he made the comment if I didn't have the dogs he could put us in a nicer room.We got to the room and you could smell other animals in the room,the sink was ready to fall to the floor,they had one blanket no extras,they turned the hot water off all the time,there was human hair on the towels,the elevator was dirty.If I was a family traveling with a pet I would never stay here,I would rather sleep in my car.This was just the pet room we stayed in.We never got our vouchers either they lied about them so we checked out and got refunded.never will we stay there again...................

Reviews.Title: “Bad Bad Bad”
Reviews.Author: marty f
Reviews.Content: The rooms smelled very musty and dirty some of the amenities that were listed was NOT available IRON, BLOW DRYER, COFFEE MAKER . Had a old 19 inch,TV lousy reception . Pool was as big as a bath tub Thank God was able to get refund and stay at Days Inn same price .. Refund took 10 days to be in my account .. I called General manager Sal who was never there to give feedback never returned phone calls ... BAD BAD BAD !!!!

Reviews.Title: “YUCK!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: bzzee
Reviews.Content: Don't stay at this moldy hotel. There is moss growing on the balcony, hole in the door, 19" TV bring your own cable and TV stand, bring throw rugs. Don't plan on taking a shower. The toilet was leaking and the sink was outside of the room. Furniture was dirty and for midgets. Fridge was gross, bring a cooler. Bring your own bedding and lysol by the case. We slept in our clothes and shoes on top of the blanket. So if you don't mind crusty have a great time.

Reviews.Title: “Trust all the bad reviews!”
Reviews.Author: kerjen82
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at the Serene this past weekend. We have stayed their before and took our pups with us. Probably the only reason we decided to go back since it was the only place with vacancy on such a short notice. Well every time we go...it gets worse! Room was disgusting, hair on floor in bathroom, on pillow and comforter, floor does not look like it has seen a sweeper all summer long, glass sliding door on balcony was broken and did not lock, looks like punch marks in the wall, rust everywhere, you could see light in the door from rusting, someone so kindly left their boogers on the wall by the sofa, and the bathroom smelled worse than a men's locker room! So after we noticed all the disgusting things I asked for someone to clean our room...well that never happened. So I whipped everything up and vowed we will NEVER stay their AGAIN! NASTY PLACE!! EWWWW!!

Reviews.Title: “You Get What You Pay For”
Reviews.Author: mlesznar
Reviews.Content: We stayed here after our campsite was demolished by the storms. We found the staff to be friendly and polite. We had a problem with the key to our room and they fixed it right away. The room was dated, the couch had stains on it. One blanket had a hole in it. The beds were not comfortable, you sank to the middle when you laid down in it. There was a big rusty hole in the bathtub. The door had rust around it. The first number on our door was rusted away as well. The balcony was ok. The bathroom needed to be updated. However, we only paid $125.00 per night, which is cheap for OC in July. The pool was clean, small, but clean. It was a little sandy at the bottom. Also our "peep hole" on the door was shattered. There was plenty of parking and it was in a good location, very close to the beach. Husband liked it, he would stay again, wife and kids not too sure about returning. They advertise free WIFI, but it didn't work for us!

Reviews.Title: “BEYOND GROSS”
Reviews.Author: Tashema31
Reviews.Content: I have NO IDEA why this DUMP is still OPEN. I reserved this hotel suite in February of this year planning a Great Vacation for my family. Only to arrive at this NASTY PLACE where the smoke detector was laying on the table the Carpet looked like it had NEVER BEEN CLEANED... the Walls were DIRTY the Furniture was Filthy and Outdated... the ROOM smelled Horrible... the Door to separate the Bedroom from the Living room to be hanging by the top hinge and a BIG FIST HOLE threw it. The refrigerator was RUSTY... and once you sat down on the BED it COLLAPSED to the FLOOR.... This was the FINAL straw. so we went to the office and DEMANDED a REFUND... only to be shown 4 other rooms that were no better than the one the MANAGER gave us in the first place. The Girl that showed us the other rooms said she would not even stay in the rooms so WHY the HECK are you taking ppls money and insisting they stay in this piece of TRASH??? We loaded up the car and the next morning and when the MANAGER came in he tried to Justify this FILTH but we were not having it.. He REFUNDED us our MONEY and we went on our WAY and FOUND and AWESOME HOTEL that was CLEAN and 100% BETTER than this!!

Reviews.Title: “WORST HOTEL EVER!”
Reviews.Author: Allison1719
Reviews.Content: ATTENTION GRADUATES! DO NOT SAY AT THIS HOTEL! They're employees are unprofessional, the manager is corrupt, and they cheat people of their money. Two of my friends and I stayed at this hotel for senior week, and it was absolute Hell. We had signed up for a senior week package only to find out we over paid and they lied to us. We were told we were going to get free passes for the bus and to h2o. We went to h2o and the people there said they never give free passes and that this hotel has been playing people for years. Also, the whole time we were there, 2 of the employees kept harrassing us. Everynight they wanted us to party with them. They would come barging in to our hotel room drunk and the one looked up my cell phone number on the company computer and kept calling me. One night when they were drunk, he one employee got into an argument with my one friend and he pulled a knife on her! His excuse was he was "protecting himself" TOTAL LIE. The whole week we stayed there, we never once had room service! Along with our package we had to have a security deposit. If nothing was damaged when we left, we would get that money back. The people told us they look for ways to not give peoples money back and when they ind a reason, they keep the money for themselves. Whoever is reading this, I SWEAR i am not lying! Ive never seen anything like this. The people that work there are dogs! Whatever you do, please do not stay at this hotel! It is a complete waste of money!

Reviews.Title: “WORST HOTEL EVER STAY AWAY FROM IT”
Reviews.Author: MEGS2212
Reviews.Content: just got back from staying there i booked ahead of time so there was nothing i could do...this place was a little cheaper then the other places but not buy much....it was dirty the walls had dirt and stuff i don't even know what eles...the carpets were just gross...we had mold growing on our balcony...there was no house keeping...yes i saw the house keeping but not once did they come to our room...i went down and told the front desk several times a day and still no one showed up....i had to change the sheets and run the vacuumm in the hotel...the dust in the rooms was just not right.... the blinds when opened all the dust went flying off looked like they have not been cleaned in years...when talking to other people staying there. they all agreed they would not be returning...they were very dissapointed...not to mention i took 2 healthy kids with me and spend the last 2 days caring for sick kids because of these conditions. i will be posting on every site possible untile they issue some type of refund...this hotel SUCKS.....

Reviews.Title: “Already planning a return trip”
Reviews.Author: racq88
Reviews.Content: As a family, we enjoyed our stay at this hotel. Very pleasant helpful, and informative staff: from the time we checked in, to housekeeping requests, and a maintenance issue. As for the room, we were very pleased with the bedding and towels. Everything in our room worked. The location of this hotel is what drew us back to this hotel for the 2nd time. With 2 little kids in tow, the closeness of the beach is perfect! Just a quick sprint from the beach to the hotel in case of any beach emergencies (like a bathroom break!). CVS and McDonald's are within walking distance. We did not get Ocean view on this stay, but it didn't matter to us, because we were always out enjoying the beach and the Boardwalk. Already planning a return trip before this summer is over.

Reviews.Title: “DUMP!”
Reviews.Author: tonya72462
Reviews.Content: DON'T STAY HERE !! needed a place to stay for the week that took pets no reservations anywhere, just winging for the week ..wife took a look at the place after I booked it for the week..NO WAY she would stay there, or myself. I moved her out to a cleaner hotel , I stayed one night ,until I could figure out what to do with my dog. I left there itching ! Now I am trying to get a refund for time I didn't use..not having much luck with this either.

Reviews.Title: “BRING DISINFECTANT”
Reviews.Author: curlyQ823
Reviews.Content: My husband and I had no choice but to stay in this dump because our reservations were lost at another hotel and this is the only hotel that had any vacancy left on this Memorial Day holiday. THAT should have been our first clue! AND WE PAID $410.00 dollars!! I understand the place is old and I can deal with that. BUT..."hotels" are SUPPOSED TO BE CLEAN!! The bathroom floor was filthy, the tub had hair in it. The sheets and blankest had stains, spackle dust was left on the floor from previous repairs, the electric socket plates were never replaced, there were cigarette butts on our balcony floor,the television didn't work and the telephone didnt work. LAST BUT NOT LEAST the "hotel" let a bbq party of about 20 people go on for two days right under our blacony. The bbq smoke was UNBEARABLE! Maintenance did come in to fix the television and was unable to fix the phone problem because it was a problem with the lines in the wall. The manager Sal was nowhere to be found all weekend for us to get something done about all of these problems. The office was locked and still no manager at 10:10 am on our day of checkout...I wanted a receipt and to complain again but no one was available. Finally, the next day I called and got a hold of Sal...He appologized and said he would give us a discount...hahaha...he emailed me my receipt and a note telling me he would mail a $50 dollar voucher for our next stay!!! I told him dont bother we are NEVER ever even going NEAR the place again!!

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting!”
Reviews.Author: emh25
Reviews.Content: This was absolutely the most disgusting hotel I have ever encountered! One star is far too generous, negative stars would be more appropriate. The service was appalling and the room was filthy and falling apart. Someone had their room broken into and items/money were stolen. I was tempted by the fact that this was a dog-friendly hotel, but after experiencing the slow and completely incompetent service at the front desk and seeing the room, I would not even dare leave my dog alone in the room, and we got a refund and left. I read many reviews on this website, and sometimes I think people writing negative reviews might be too picky, or might not be taking the low cost of the hotel into account, etc. Trust me on this one, this place is an absolute dump and should be condemned. I don't care how cheap it is, stay somewhere else. You couldn't pay me to stay there.

Reviews.Title: “The Serene Hotel is the perfect place with or without your dog!”
Reviews.Author: Laura D
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Serene Hotel because we love to take our pet. Ocean City has only three other motels that are pet friendly and they are more expensive and/or they have certain restrictions if you bring your pet. I like having a balcony like the Serene Hotel has that allows you to let your pet sit out on the balcony with you and the rates are affordable. I will definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Why is this hotel still allowed to rent out room!?!?!?!?”
Reviews.Author: joan_edwards36
Reviews.Content: The worst hotel I've ever stayed in!! plain and simple this place needs a wrecking ball. People please take heed to the reviews. You have been warned.

Reviews.Title: “DIVE”
Reviews.Author: MDLTNPA
Reviews.Content: OMG this was the worst hotel ever! I can't believe OC lets this place stay in business. Do you people not have any codes in OC. This place is falling down, everything is worn out and there were no mattress covers on the bed the bathroom door did not shut and everything was disgusting. Even the grounds around the hotel are dirty. Elevators were spray painted OMG i just could go on and on. I was never so disgusted in my life! DO NOT STAY HERE AND OC you need to do better at enforcing your codes (if you have any) on Hotels of this nature. RUN AWAY FROM THIS PLACE

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting, run down, horrible place to stay”
Reviews.Author: dcporter5
Reviews.Content: My husband picked this place to stay for the weekend because all the regular places we stay in OC were booked. I read the reviews before we left and kind of knew what we were getting into. But when we arrived it was so much worse than we anticipated. You knew before you got to the room it was going to be filthy. The hallways were black like they hadnt been cleaned in years and everything smelled. The door into our "suite" was half broken and then we walked in. 1960's decor, holes in wall, things hanging off the walls, tv missing and no remote for the other tv, shower curtian held up by the tile, rust all over the bathroom, no smoke detector, sliding glass door broken and no screen and the list goes on. We went down to ask if all if all the rooms were like this one and the girl was embarassed and rolled her eyes and said yes, that we got one of the better ones, the suites. I did see a few other people staying there but with dogs. This place is only fit for animals. WIFI didnt work the whole time we were there, they said it only worked sometimes. My husband and I made the best of it but dont waste your time if you have a choice.

Reviews.Title: “RUN AWAY!!!!”
Reviews.Author: RocknSnoBoarder
Reviews.Content: I don't even know where to start about this horrible place. Everything is dirty; floors, walls, beds everything! Didn't think it could get worse until I met the staff. Horribly rude! And then I was charged incorrectly and no one would give me a straight answer to justify the charges. Was told one price and then charged another, and then additional charges were added after I left! Avoid at all costs! Would have rated lower if it was possible.

Reviews.Title: “Worst dump I have stayed in in over 30 years of travelling”
Reviews.Author: Sparky739
Reviews.Content: I knew I was in trouble when they would not accept American Express. Room was clean but the carpet was worn out, the doors were rusted, only half the lights worked, the walls and paint were tired, and the furniture was old and probably bought at auction. The tube TV barely displayed a picture. I felt like I had made a wrong turn and I was now on skid row. My 'ocean view suite' was a joke...concrete stairs were right in front of the window and blocked any view. Opening the rusted door showed that I was 2 blocks off the beach...I couldn't even SEE the ocean. The bed was very low to the ground and hard as a rock. At first I thought they only had a box spring on it. The air conditioning was set to 65 and when we shut it down we could start to smell the room's funkiness so we cranked it up and froze all night. What a joke. What a pig sty. What a dump. Save your money...go somewhere else. Wish my GPS had a setting to 'Avoid Ghetto'.

Reviews.Title: “Best location for Endless Summer with a pet”
Reviews.Author: crzrspt
Reviews.Content: We have been coming to this hotel for several years now with our dog during Endless Summer. We can sit outside our door and watch all the show cars go by. We can walk the dog on the beach safely. There are several parking spots that are covered for our car's protection. We would and have recommended this hotel to friends. We will continue to stay here every year during this exciting weekend.

Reviews.Title: “STAY AWAY - THIS PLACE IS NASTY AND STAFF ARE RUDE!”
Reviews.Author: Going2Camp
Reviews.Content: What a nightmare. This hotel was booked for a family trip to Ocean City this August (2010). Wen we arrived later on Sunday afternoon, we got signed in, received our keys, and went up to our room on the second floor. The big plastic room keys look like the old punch cards from the old computer days. When we entered the room we were a bit surprised. The TV was an old 19" CRT model, there were holes in the walls that were patched but not painted, the light above one of the beds didn't work, and the room had a funky smell. Next I pulled out the laptop to see how the internet speed was. I needed a password so I went to call the front desk, BUT thats when I realized the phone in the room was dead. I walked down to the front desk and spoke to the desk attendent Morgan. I told her the phone didn't work and Morgan said there was nobody there to check the phone until the next morning. I asked for the Internet password and right away Morgan informed me that the WiFi has not been working well for the past few days. She said I could come to the front office and plug in if the WiFi didn't work. I went back to the room and attempted to get connected. Getting connected didn't happen. The connection wouldn't stay on for more than a few seconds. My wife and I then went down to the front office to speak with a manager. Morgan at the front desk said there was no manager available until the next morning. I told her we were unhappy with the room and didn't want to stay there, but I was just told that I would have to take that up with the manager the next morning. We then went back up and took all our luggage back to our vehicle and took the keys back to the front desk. Morgan said she couldn't give us a refund because only a manager could do that. I asked Morgan to call a manager and received alot of attutude. She did call a manager named Shauna and left a voicemail to call back. Morgan printed out a checkout slip, but didn't refund the charges. We went down the road and found a new place to stay and the next morning we went back. There was a manager there the next morning and he did refund all the charges in full. I thought the nightmare was done with but then a few days later I found a new charge on my credit card for an amount over $400. I right away called the Serine Hotel and sure enough Morgan answered the phone and told me there was no managager there. Morgan told me she seen the charge but couldn't explain why. Bottom line is the Serine Hotel and Suites is a real dump. I would not recommend this place to anyone. If you decide to ignore this review then Stay at the Serine Hotel then do so at your own risk.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Great People, Had A Blast!”
Reviews.Author: mycuriousgeorge7
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Serene Hotel over the 4th of July weekend 2010 and had a blast! The hotel is in Northern Ocean City (130th street) so you get away from all the young teenagers down at the board walk. It was just a block to the beach, surrounded by restaurants and plenty of things to do. Plus, it was the best price in town! I am 100% going back! -Shaina Asbury

Reviews.Title: “The perfect hotel”
Reviews.Author: Str1ngette
Reviews.Content: My husband and I came in very late and we were hot, tired and just wanted to sleep. When we got to the hotel, we checked in and the room that was assigned to us wasn't what I was expecting; so I went back down to the lobby and they gave me two keys to look at two different rooms to see if I like either of them to make up for the room that was assigned to us; and we picked the room that suited us best and we were so happy. It fitted just what we needed, along with our dogs that traveled 6 hours with us as we came down from upstate New York. The staff here really went out of their way to make us feel comfortable and happy. If anyone were to ask us where to stay when in Ocean City, I would highly recommend Serene Hotel and Suites; the staff were extremely helpful and pleasant! I literally cried the day we had to leave; but I will be coming back next year to the same hotel, that is for sure!

Reviews.Title: “See it for yourself”
Reviews.Author: msmiaone
Reviews.Content: My family and I just recently vacationed in OC and stayed at the Serene Hotels and Suites. Probabl like many others, i sat at the computer day after day reading reviews over and over, somehow hoping they would change so i could feel better about the hotel. The reviews were bad, but the price was unbelievable, so i said what the heck, push come to shove we leave and stay somewhere else. We had a party of 6 including our dog. From the moment i walked in , I was SHOCKED. No its not a a 5 star hotel, but the reviews didnt do it any justice. We stayed in a King suite, with 2 queen beds. I think what upsets people is that when you think Hotel, you expect certain things, but to me this was more like an apartment. It was spacious, clean, and their in the process of painting and changing the carpets. The location is THE BEST, and the beach is awesome, its not as crowded as other beaches. Its a little far from the Boardwalk, bt for 2 dollars you can get on the bus that rides up and down the strip!!!!!!!!! It beats driving and trying to park. THe staff was very friendly and accomadating. we didnt see holes in the wall, bugs, or dirty carpets. We had a great time at a great price. AGAIN, SEE IT FOR YOURSELF!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, affordable, but not fancy.”
Reviews.Author: azbridgie
Reviews.Content: I work in the hospitality industry and actually have several choices to stay when I travel; however, we always stay at Serene. You'll read the other reviews and hear the bad, the worse, etc. The hotel is not fancy by any means, if you are looking for the vacation of a lifetime and expect concierge level of service do not stay at Serene. However, if you are looking to enjoy a vacation and have a front desk that you feel like it is your aunt and you can call and ask for anything, then stay at Serene. Each guest gets a free bag of ice once a day. This doesn't seem like a big deal but you get to walk down from your room, top off your cooler and roll right down to the beach. The beds are comfortable enough, the views from the balconies are great. There isn't always enough towels, that does annoy me but the front desk does what they can. Honestly, I would say the #1 problem with the hotel is the owners willingness to put any more money into it. The staff that is there is friendly as can be though. And after a day on the beach it is nice to relax in the pool for a bit which the sun hits perfectly in the evening hours. Also, the restaurant on the block has great bloody mary's and breakfast. You can walk accross the street to 7-11 or WaWa.

Reviews.Title: “Nasty Gross Disgusting and then some”
Reviews.Author: jswartz
Reviews.Content: Traveled to Beach without reservations not wise move, but found serene motel to have vacancy for nights needed. First red flag should have been nasty motel office, looked dirty. So we pay extra for an ocean view room on 3rd floor, me and my husband are traveling with 3 kids 8,4,under 2 year old. We walk in the room it stinks of some nasty oder, now the motel lets pets so the carpet is all stained I can only imagine how much dog matter was on the carpet my children were walking on. Ants were crawling all over the microwave and refrigerator across the dressers on walls. All snacks had to be securely wrapped. So we check out our "private balcony" the railing is broken on the bottom, so if my childern were to be out there and push on it they could fall 3 floors, so extra money spent on a ocean view we could not use. Also broken hand rails on steps where children could fall down between the concrete steps several floors. Place was dirty, smelly and unsafe.

Reviews.Title: “find another place to stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: MissYouVA
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately we did not see the reviews for this "hotel" until after having the worst hotel experience of my life. It was so uncomfortable that I felt compelled to warn others of this atrocious place. In addition to the comments the other reviews have made, I wanted to add that the carpets were so filthy (what word can mean dirtier than filthy??) I literally had to scrub my children's feet with soap right before we left because the soles of their feet were BLACK. Room was nothing like the website published. Also, they advertised two televisions, and we only had one tiny one. There were two tiny bars of soap, but none of the other toiletries one expects at a hotel, and there was no coffee pot or iron in the room. The towels were clean, and the bathroom wasn't dirty, but it was very stained and badly water-damaged. Staff was friendly enough and any time we asked for something we got it, but over all this place was AWFUL!!! I would have been more satisfied in a tent on the beach.

Reviews.Title: “DISGUSTING - Disgusting - DISGUSTING - Disgusting”
Reviews.Author: missysueh
Reviews.Content: We originally booked this room for a car show that we were attending on the board walk in Ocean City, MD. Another couple that attends the show booked it as well, since they were bringing two dogs. Unfortunately I had reserved the room for multiple nights and the cost was non-refundable. In addition, we didn't arrive until 2am and did not think to investigate the room prior to paying the full amount. Upon entering our room, we were completely outraged and disgusted. First of all, the carpet is dirty, and the curtains were literally falling down on one side. The mattress was covered in very noisy plastic, the TV blinked on and off, the couch, which was once navy blue and white striped, was literally brown and blue. The toilet wouldn't flush and there were pale stains on the white towels in the bathroom. Also, the ceiling looked as if it was rotting away in the bathroom, probably from years of steam and moisture. It was grotesque. I couldn't fathom that a hotel was this dirty and still had numerous occupants. We talked to the front desk and they denied us any refund but they did agree to move us to a "renovated" room. The next room, which was slightly larger and had a better view of the highway had a similar filthy couch, a hole punched in a wall, and a spider that had built a nice home in a corner. I have never in my life stayed in such a filthy place, and I have stayed in much less expensive hotels when I was a teenager. Being in this place creates a panic feeling of wanting to run, fast, and get a nice, long, hot shower.

Reviews.Title: “Avoid at all possible costs!”
Reviews.Author: nowaynotme
Reviews.Content: Labor Day weekend - and OC motels in high demand. Most places were booking for 3-night stays just ahead of the big rate drop so I'll admit I was over a barrel because I was there - and needed a place to stay right then. I cancelled reservations at a Marriott in Dover at $181.00 a night because I was unexpectedly in OC - so for $243.00 a night we got a room I would not have even briefly considered staying in for $25 a night. It was filthy, smelled terrible, had marks, stains and holes all over the walls - the bathroom was frightening and the shower/bath tub was vile, stained and moldy. It was funny - we actually couldn't stay - after shelling out that money neither I nor my other friends could stay in their rooms and ended u checking out. I ended up just driving back to Bel Air - it was miserable to have spent that coin only to not even use the room. TERRIBLE.

Reviews.Title: “Much better options are available if you bring your Dog. (Read on in case the previous reviews haven’t scared you off a”
Reviews.Author: Skihouse132
Reviews.Content: We booked a pet room at the Serene Hotel before reading any of the TripAdvisor reviews for our anniversary weekend in June. This was a mistake…we were worried but decided to give the hotel the benefit of the doubt. After checking in and seeing the hotel and room, we immediately left. I was able to negotiate a refund of our deposit, and the front desk staff was very apologetic for: 1.) Vomit in stairwell, 2.) Smell of urine in elevator, 3.) rust on ceiling of shower 4.) holes in walls 5.) pet odor in room 6.) general state of establishment. The good news is that a potential disaster for the weekend was avoided ; we found a dog room available at the Clarion at the last minute for nearly the same price as the Serene. (The Clarion is a nice place!).

Reviews.Title: “The worse experience ever”
Reviews.Author: Jiboa
Reviews.Content: I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS HOTEL AT ALL. STAY AWAY FROM IT. I konw it is pick season during the summer and we are always trying to save money specially with this economy, but I think paying over $400 dollars and to have to live this experience it is not worth it or fair. The hotel welcomes pets. I have pets myself, but if they welcome pets, they need to maintain the rooms. The carpets were stained, the mini fridge was leaking water, and with cat/dog hairs all over it, carpet was wet from the water coming out from the fridge, the bed sheets had dog or car hair all over, no coffee maker, the blind was broken. The room was a disaster. It had two double beds and one sofa bed. The sofa bed matt was flat. My sister, her husband and their daughter slept there and the next morning they told me that they had slept on the springs/coils/wire, you name it. I spoke to the cleaning lady and asked her to please change the sheet and to bring us a new sofa mattress. When we got home that night (late) the sheets were changed, but did not changed the mattress on the sofa bed, did not leave toilet paper or bedding sheets for the sofa bed, no blankets, etc. When I chedked out, I went and to talked to a different person and she said that all their sofa be mattress were the same that they could not have given me a better one, and that if I needed to talk to the manager to call the following day. The worse part is after we left my cousin's husband showed his back and he had scratched all his back and I was mad and told them that they should of told me when I went to check out so that I could show them what had happened to them, but they didn't because they know how I am and new that I was not going to tolerate it. How could I? I was paying my hard earned money for them not to care about their guets' stay, of course I was not going to tolerate it. They didn't even apologized. I DO NO RECOMMEND THIS HOTEL AT ALL!!! STAY AWAY.

Reviews.Title: “Good deal”
Reviews.Author: bigdogohio
Reviews.Content: Decent hotel, loved the location, will stay their agan.

Reviews.Title: “If you must bring the pets, then you must settle.”
Reviews.Author: wino103
Reviews.Content: Pros: Very close to the beach, spacious rooms, pets allowed, plenty of parking, swimming pool Cons: Room was in bad condition with paint peeling and rust, bed linens did not appear clean, black hairs all over and under sheets, very small tv, Wi Fi is $8 for 24 hours

Reviews.Title: “Enjoy bringing dogs w/ us.”
Reviews.Author: becboo6
Reviews.Content: I always enjoy being able to bring my two small dogs with us. This hotel is at a convenient location and being remodeled is a plus.

Reviews.Title: “This place is a dump!!”
Reviews.Author: vacation053
Reviews.Content: My recent stay was a nightmare!! Outlet didn't work, so the microwave and fridge didn't work. Roof leaked, door didn't stay closed/locked - the wind blew it opened when we were not there, so our personal belongings were left unsecure. But to top it off, we had no hot water for the entire weekend!! The pilot light kept blowing out, so the maintenance guy had to keep lighting it. The front desk told me, to check out if it was that bad, but when I asked if they were going to give me a refund they said no!! There was no manager to speak to and they won't return my phone call. However, we were at their mercy and we had to wait for them to light it when they were good and ready!! Never again, this place was a dump!!

Reviews.Title: “Affordable, conviently located, dog friendly hotel”
Reviews.Author: pearsonfamilia
Reviews.Content: Hotel staff is friendly and quick to help out with anything you need. Great location, close but not too close. Best part about it half a block from the beach that's never too crowded.

Reviews.Title: “Great experience!”
Reviews.Author: MonktonJosh21
Reviews.Content: Great hotel. Very affordable for the room you choose. The rooms were great, very clean and very spacious. The pool was amazing and the staff was wonderful. The overall room was a good deal, good price for such a big room and everything it came with. A short walk to the beach was a must and this hotel delivered! Overall this hotel was amazing and that is why we have gone to it for the past two years and are returning this year.

Reviews.Title: “Great!”
Reviews.Author: matolley
Reviews.Content: If you are on a budget, the Serene is a great place to stay. The rooms are very spacious equipped with fridge, microwave and tv. The front desk service was phenomenal! Everyone was very friendly. It is in a great location, near many great restaurants and a grocery store right across the street. It is also one of the few places in Ocean City where you can bring your pets!

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay!”
Reviews.Author: cflana3
Reviews.Content: Best value for your money. Clean and close to beach. Great housekeeping services. Quiet.

Reviews.Title: “Do Not Waste Your Money”
Reviews.Author: Angelink72
Reviews.Content: Place was nasty, no smoke detector, no coffee, holes in walls, carpet not vacuumed very well, AC worked but was super loud. Would not recommened and will not be back.

Reviews.Title: “weekend trip on a budget”
Reviews.Author: ocean1635
Reviews.Content: this hotel offers a lot and your even allowed to take your pet the rooms were clean and service was great the only thing that needed some attention was the sleeper sofa it was worn and needed repair ,but overall this is a very nice place to stay for the money,location ,the vicario family,new jersey

Reviews.Title: “Terrible value”
Reviews.Author: OntarioJam
Reviews.Content: Very overpriced. Paid $179 for a suite which was not nice at all. No remote for the TV, no hairdryer or shampoo! Walls had bare sanded areas. Bathtub had a number of grab bars mounted on wood - was disgusting and only got a trickle of water out of shower. Carpet was stained. Mold on walls, etc, etc.

Reviews.Title: “Weekend of SERENEity”
Reviews.Author: HKessinger
Reviews.Content: I needed a break and I found it at The Serene. Balcony views of the ocean crashing against the shore during the day, a magnificent lightstorm over the water at night. The room was simply outfitted but clean and comfortable. Fridge kept our bottled water icy cold, micro and other amenities available if needed. The staff is super friendly and VERY accomodating. The hotel location is convenient to the beach as well as restaurants and shops. Thanks.....I'll be back for certain!! Heidi

Reviews.Title: “what a great trip we had”
Reviews.Author: seega7
Reviews.Content: it was a perfect location for the family especially with having a dog travel with us, the stores were across the street and our 2 favourite restuarants were in walking distance, the beach was right there, the rooms were lovely and clean and if we needed anything the staff were there for us, thanks again and we,ll see you every year!

Reviews.Title: “Family Vacation”
Reviews.Author: Bulldog0325
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this hotel for the past 4 years because they allow dogs. We won't travel without our loving bulldog. And we have a 6 year old son. The staff was also friendly and helpfu. We will definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “We were very happy finding this dog friendly, clean hotel”
Reviews.Author: sandyNewJersey
Reviews.Content: We were very happy with our room. We chose it because it was dog friendly, but will return with or without our dog. The staff is great and the location wonderful.

Reviews.Title: “Great place”
Reviews.Author: mrfiles
Reviews.Content: My name is matt files me and three other people and my black lab went down and the hotel is one of the only ones you can take your dog to the hotel was extra clean very nice no complaints and great parking all of the people who worked there were very nice and respectful and helping. 15581

Reviews.Title: “Pet Friendly!”
Reviews.Author: PetTraveler51
Reviews.Content: It is hard to find a hotel in Ocean City that is pet friendly. This hotel is not only pet friendly, but the rates are very reasonable. We enjoyed our stay and are planning to return in the near future.

Reviews.Title: “Stay In Your Car..It's Cleaner”
Reviews.Author: 4theboyz
Reviews.Content: This was the most disgusting hotels I have ever seen!!! You wanted to wear your clothes & shoes in the shower. The floors were filthy, the sheets were dirty and there was trash on the floor when we checked in. The sliding glass door didn't even have a lock on it so we had to wedge a handle in the sliding door frame to keep anyone from coming in. I stayed with my husband and 2 kids and even my 5 and 6 year olds commented how dirty it was. They allow pets which probably explains the smell. I would NEVER recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Not so serene”
Reviews.Author: jonthesavage
Reviews.Content: Keeping in mind that this is one of the cheapest suites to stay in in Ocean City, there were still some problems which should not have been an issue. First, even though we registered for three guests in our room, our bathroom only contained one wash cloth. There was still trash under the sink (empty bottles and paper) left over from the previous guest. On top of that, there were no sheets for the pullout sofa. One man I saw took his phone to the desk because it had literally been ripped from the wall and the wires were hanging out. During the night, people in other rooms were extrememly loud and running around outside. This place seems more fit for teenagers looking to party than for families. I brought these issues up with the front desk and they offered to give me free breakfast at the restaurant next door but I was under a time crunch. I asked for a discount to be applied to my room and they said they couldn't do that without permission. I said I would call management when I got home.

Reviews.Title: “Never Again!”
Reviews.Author: craw896
Reviews.Content: This was our second year vacation in Ocean City. The hotel we stayed at last year was full so we opted on this one... BIG MISTAKE! It was soooo dirty! As soon as we walked in the room, we noticed the dirty floors, the hand towel left under one of the beds, the really disgusting and dirty bathroom and the balcony door we could barely open! UGH!!! We stayed there for 4days and had our room cleaned only once, yet the tip envelope was on the mirror. We also had our toilet clogged so we were told that in the meantime there was a public toilet on the first floor, well... that was so disgusting we just rather go to the local Burger King (toilets were cleaner there), the only thing they did about our bathroom was send us a plunger and my husband wound up doing the "plunging" himself! Then were also being charged $1.00 for a bag of ice, not that the dollar was alot, but it was rediculous since we couldn't even get our room clean (and we complained directly to the manager about our room but he was more interested in charging the dollar for the ice!), and had to unclog our bathroom toilet ourselves! Gross, Gross, Gross is all I have to say about this hotel. Would NEVER stay there again nor would I ever recommend to anyone!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting”
Reviews.Author: sydodle3
Reviews.Content: The hotel is so outdated that the door hinges are rusty. The floors are filty and my pillow had hair on it! Then a roach crawled in my suitcase and came home with me. YUK!!! We even added on a day and they didn't bother to come in to clean, only left extra towels in a trashbag on the door.

Reviews.Title: “oh my!”
Reviews.Author: beachgrl288
Reviews.Content: This place was one of the dirtiest places I've stayed at in Ocean City. The room looked like it had not been cleaned at all when I checked in. There was a full soda can sitting by the bed food crumbs everywhere. The only reason I knew the cleaning people had been there was there were new folded towels and new soaps. I stayed in one if the suites which claimed to have 2 t.v.'s and there was only one. The chairs on the balcony looked like someone had just thrown them out there. The bathroom is a whole other story the tub had rust all in the bottom and the ceiling was completely molded and that doesn't surprise me since they were drop ceilings who does that?? The sheets had tons of stains on them thank god i brought my own blankets! The worst part about the whole place is the so called changing room!!! I felt like i was in a bad horror movie! It was an odd small room with two windows which the blinds had been torn up and were half falling off! it was hot and the shower was so gross!!!! it had tons of old soups and the shower curtain and rod fell off when my boyfriend when to get in!! it was the worst thing i have ever seen i wouldn't be surprised if i got some gross disease from that place! DO NOT STAY HERE!

Reviews.Title: “Nothing Serene about it...”
Reviews.Author: happyvoyage
Reviews.Content: I knew that this was a no frills hotel, but it was worse than I could imagine. The bathroom floor had not been cleaned, there was leftover soap in the bathroom. We rented a suite and the living room didn't have a t.v., they said it was too expensive to replace. They did not have an iron or blow dryer available, which is unheard of even in the most modest of hotels! The curtain rod was falling down @ the balcony window and the paint was peeling from the walls and the sofa in the living room was just scary! Speaking of scary, don't even think about using their "changing room", I have never seen anything so disgusting & dirty. We booked this hotel because most everything else was full, next time we'll just stay home!!

Reviews.Title: “nice place - nice price”
Reviews.Author: ppkallday
Reviews.Content: Its hard to find a clean yet affordable hotel in Ocean City. Look no further, this place is a nice place at a nice price. We are coming back this year again and we are bringing our friends!

Reviews.Title: “Run down and overpriced”
Reviews.Author: travelinfool50
Reviews.Content: Stayed there because other hotels were sold out. Rooms are run down/out of date and staff is indifferent. Better off at a chain hotel where they have some quality control.

Reviews.Title: “great place”
Reviews.Author: bmarley630
Reviews.Content: right by the beach close to the bus and a perfect place for me and some friends to stay.

Reviews.Title: “It was ok”
Reviews.Author: sunnydog
Reviews.Content: Just returned from a weekend stay at Serene and it was ok. We decided to stay here because we were traveling with out pet dog and this was one of the few hotels that would accomodate us. The hotel staff was very nice and the room itself was clean and plenty big although there were obvious signs of wear and tear such as unpatched holes in the walls. We stayed in a king suite with an ocean view. If you sat in the living room on the pleather couch and looked out the window at an angle you could see the ocean. Our balcony faced Coastal Hwy. and we got alot of use out of it because it was Cruisers weekend. We didn't know that when we booked so it was a nice added bonus to sit in the privacy of our own room and watch the steady stream of classic cars. The location is good. There's a Wawa. 7-11, Dunkin' Donuts and CVS right across the street. Dough Roller pizza, Hooters, and Dumsers Dairyland are a few streets up. Dough Roller has excellent pizza if you're like me and prefer it thin and greasy. Dumsers serves good food and the best ice cream I've ever had. They say they make it fresh every day the old fashioned way and it blows the stuff from your grocers freezer away. The crabcake factory is an onsite restaurant and their jumbo lump crabcake was decent. We had a great shrimp appetizer that featured peeled shrimp with onions and old bay. Northside park is also a short walk from the hotel which was convenient for dog walking.

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting!!! Horrific! Repulsive!!!”
Reviews.Author: ColetteSouthJersey
Reviews.Content: Disgusting!!! Horrific! Repulsive!!! Do not book this hotel and please read all the reviews. We were looking for Columbus Day weekend and everything was booked up (except for this place), so we booked on-line. Check-in was easy and front desk nice, but when we got to our room the first thing we noticed were the words "[--]" scratched into the door. Room stank like cat pee as soon as we opened the door. Holes in walls, holes in the ceiling dirty, dirty dirty!!!! We did not stay here and my only option was to sleep in my car. Im surprised the board of health hasnt shut it down!!!

Reviews.Title: “Definitely no thrills”
Reviews.Author: Rebanthony
Reviews.Content: I have read alot about the Serene Hotel and I was worried. When we got there, the help was very friendly and let us in our room an hour early. Our room was clean, it had clean sheets, a working air conditioner, a working shower, toilet and sink and two working TVs. We rented a suite with no view, but from our balcony we could see the ocean and the bay. They also have a good size built in swimming pool and they are about 100 yards from the beach. Also they have plenty of parking spaces. If that is all you care about, then this is the place for you. However.... The bathroom, it had a fiberglass built in unit and they decided to add hand rails, and they used wood attached to the fiberglass unit and attached the hand rails to wood. Wood in a bathtub/shower? There was a towel plugging a hole in the bathroom ceiling and the sink did not have a stopper. The water pressure was very low (I don't know if this was just during our visit or like this all the time) The TV's had no remote controls. I asked at the desk and they said they had none. I haven't had to manually change channels in 25 years. (Ok I am lazy). The air conditioners worked perfectly but I will not be surprised if it fell out of the wall in the coming days. There was a crack in the wall....... that I could see light coming in from outside!! There was NO ICE for our entire stay. They didn't have an ice machine, but purchase bags and you can take one bag a day... if there was ever any to begin with. The hotel issues keys and not cards. This bothered me since our deadbolt on our door did not work. It was installed at least 1/2 inch off the hole. So you be your own judge if it is worth the money.

Reviews.Title: “This room was filthy!!!!”
Reviews.Author: beachfam5
Reviews.Content: We paid $269.00 for the night to stay in a room that hadn't been cleaned. There was pet hair everywhere! Nothing had been wiped down, the bathroom was gross, and the beds had dog/cat hair all over them. I will never ever recommend this hotel. We asked for a discount (not full refund) but they said no. When I said that we would never stay there again the guys told me they didn't care, it wouldn't hurt them. I don't mind paying this much for a room but I want it to be clean. My kids and I are all allergic to dogs and cats.

Reviews.Title: “Good for sports team”
Reviews.Author: adu16
Reviews.Content: My fiance and I stayed at the Serene Hotel last year and had a great stay. I was playing in a hockey tournament at the Northside Gym in Northside Park. This hotel is perfectly located, only a few blocks away. Also, we have a dog and this is one of the few places in OC that accepts pets during peak season. The room was large and clean. We are going back again this year!! - Chris A.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: KristieRoyal
Reviews.Content: I wanted to let everyone know that the Serene Hotel and Suites is a wonderful place to stay!!! The rooms were very nice and clean. The staff was also very friendly!!! It is in a great location. I would recomend this hotel to anyone wanting to visit Ocean City MD.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: hellohallo
Reviews.Content: Great hotel. We've stayed here for 2 summers in a row and about to go for 3. Friendly managment, large rooms, very close to the beach and ample parking. Excellent value too!. Castilla 4671

Reviews.Title: “wonderful stay!”
Reviews.Author: xalizzle
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel with a group of 4 people. I was first impressed with the room size, it worked great for having 5 people in just one room. The refrigerator and microwave were life savers for our week stay. The room was clean, however we did bring our own cleaning supplies just in case. The bathroom was the dirtiest part, it could have used a little more attention. The staff was always friendly and willing to help. GREAT LOCATION! We had everything in walking distance and if not, there was a bus stop right outside of the hotel. The CVS and Wawa directly across the street was a great convience. The beach was in close walking distance and it was one of least crowded. Overall I enjoyed my stay very much and I highly reccomend it if you are looking for affordable but comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Good price for labor day”
Reviews.Author: moes2228
Reviews.Content: We stayed for under $120/night on labor day weekend. There are several problems with the hotel: --thin doors so you hear street noise all night --cleaning staff ignore do not disturb signs (we put one up, got back to our room and found it placed on the bed) --it was basically clean...remember this is a discount hotel Advantages: --we had a balcony with an ok view of the ocean --price --good parking --across the street from a grocery store & several restaraunts All-in-all, I would not stay again if I were looking for a romantic get-away. But if I were going with family or friends and was looking for a discount hotel, i would consider staying here.

Reviews.Title: “Nothing like the reviews I read.”
Reviews.Author: juppole
Reviews.Content: My husband and I spent four nights at the Serene in August with our two teenagers and two small dogs. The inside was a little "worn" but not at all like I see it described in other reviews. We did have a non smoking room so it did not smell. We had a microwave and mini fridge which were both clean. The airconditioner worked well. We had a pullout sofa bed which could stand to be replaced but it wasn't horrible by any means. We did not need our room cleaned every day but the maids always brought us plenty of fresh towels. We could see the ocean from our balcony and there was easy access to the beach. Our balcony in the front overlooked the pool which appeared clean thoughout our stay; the temperature was nice; and it was big enough to swim or just cool off. There were lots of other pet owners who were all very friendly to each other and, as far as I saw, cleaned up after their pets. After all, that is the law! (I guess I'm not sure what one reviewer expects a person to do if your pet urinates.) The Serene is on the bus line which made it easy to get to restaurants, attractions, etc., while our car stayed parked in the shaded garage. In the past, we have stayed in condos. With that in mind, it's hard to adjust to a motel room but all-in-all, it was completely adequate. Maybe some of the problems depend on what "event" is in town that week.

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed”
Reviews.Author: Familyjohns
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed at the Serene Hotel for four nights/three days. I was very disappointed in the suite. The price was okay, I went online to make reservations, so I got a discounted rate; However, the room needed a lot of renovation, the sofa bed was old with a bad mattress and the springs were broken. The televisions were 15years old. My 11year son was so disappointed because at night he likes to play his playstation, not at this hotel......Carpet was filthy, and the shower drain was clogged, had to by my own cleaning supplies. I would not recommend this suite at all, and we will not be returning to this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “THis is a bad place, dont ruin your vacation”
Reviews.Author: treefarmers2
Reviews.Content: Beware!! I wish I had read the reveiws before booking. THe website lies!! We have contacted the OC health department and the better business burea. The shower was so dirty(it had mold) hair from the previous tenant and the floor was soiled. THe odor from the room was foul. The carpet is so dirty you would never walk on it bare foot. We tried to get a refund and was denied. I didnt want to stay and wanted to leave and was told no refunds. The balcony had mold growing on the floor from the stagnet water laying on it from the AC. The owner will not call me or my husband back, and the staff were pleasant, but also agreed that the hotel is a dump. They maids never came the entire time we were there, and we have to go and get our own towels or sheets. This cost us 689.00 for 4 nights. You would not ever think by the website or the outside that you would be staying in a dump. The pool was not maintained and dirty. The walk ways had dog feces and urine on them. We watched a dog urinate on the sidewalk and it just was left there. Please dont stay here. Go somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: “ Run Away....”
Reviews.Author: VeryDisappointed
Reviews.Content: My friend and I thought about taking a fun filled trip before we start college, so we found this hotel that looked very nice from the website. We were so excited to finally be on our own at the beach, that was untill we got there. We went to check in and the pool was like a shoe box as well as the lobby to check in. Everyone was very nice when we checked in. We proceeded to our suite which we were told that it had two beds and a living room area with a fold out couch. We were put in a Smoking room which were were unaware of. We walked in and the smell was so over powering, and it was so dirty. The carpet looked like it hadn't been cleaned in a while, the chairs had white stains all over them, the worst part of the whole room was the beds. We found hair all over them, stained sheets, and they were so hard u could barily lay on them. The bathroom was also so dirty you felt the need to wear shoes in the shower, which we did everyday. So we tried to call the front desk to get towels becasue we had none, and to get new sheets, but our phone did not work. So we went to the office were they told us they would send someone to help and they changed the sheets and everything, but never brought us a new phone - good thing we didn't have an emergency!!!! Then someone threw up outside the elevator and it took them all day to clean it up, and the elevator smalled so bad all the time!! They also told us we had private balconies- it was more like a jail cell and there was no privacy what-so ever. The people in the room next to us were so loud and we heard them all the time, even their conversations becasue the walls were paper thin and our door to the balcony did not shut the whole way and the lock did not work. In the mornings the made would bang on the door untill u came, it didnt matter if you were sleeping or not if you wanted your room clean it was when she said!! This was probably the worst place I have ever stayed in and I have been to many places in the US. It was very disappointing!!! I will never stay here again and I am sorry that I did to begin with......... Don't make the same mistake that I did!!!

Reviews.Title: “The the worst lodging in Ocean City!”
Reviews.Author: lespauldreamer
Reviews.Content: My family and I made the mistake of waiting to long to book a room in Ocean City. So We found this hotel was still available. First of all the outside of the hotel looks 100 times nicer then the rooms. The room we were in was filthy and smelled like urin. The bathroom walls and miiror had snot and blood. Half the lights in the room didn't work at all. The carpet was filled with dirt, mildew and moisture. The beds were so soft and old that I couldn't sleep most of the night and woke up with aches and pains. To get to your room you have to walk thru a constant maze of outdoor narrow catwalks. I have stayed at all levels of lodging but I rather sleep in my tent or car then this dump! The price we paid was not cheap for OC. In fact they couldn't pay me 10 times what I had to pay to stay here. I really think the Health department needs to pay them a visit...That's how bad it is. Anyone that gave this motel a good review was either drunk or is use to sleeping in a gas station rest room. Please don't make the mistake of staying here. Every bad review about this place is true and then some.

Reviews.Title: “never stay in Serene Hotel & Suites..”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Man, this is the worst hotel in the planet of ocean city. I had lived on this hotel long time back in 98 and that was a nightmare. second time around it had a different name so i kind of thought it probably imroved. we got sucked again. looked like they changed the old name because of the negative publicity it had received. my wife found some pubic hair in the bathroom and we decided to leave. the guy on the counter does not want to refund our money. An old guy in thick glasses ( later i found it was the owner ) offred to send some one to clean the room but wouldn't give refund. having no choice i mean i felt sucked. Forget the pool. its like a fish tank. The owner i heard is just too bad. they gotta have someone to inspect prices and the quality in hotels down there. the whole place is a mess. please just don't go.

Reviews.Title: “Don't Do it!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We planned a weekend in OC & ran into a nightmare the Serene!! Upon waiting to check in for 45 mins. we headed to our room which was open... inside the room was not clean. There was milk, cereal bowls, dirty towels uncleaned sheets in the room. The bonus was the pair of dirty boxer shorts laying on the floor. The elevator smelled like vomit & beer. When we requested a new room they sent us to a room that had 2 less beds. When we said we had dinner plans & we needed a room with the number of beds we requested & we needed a shower. They offered some "clean" towels & offered to send the cleaning staff!! The floors were sticking and the rooms reeked, other customers complained about urine & feces in the tub? It's not worth the aggravation! The only positive thing about the place was after several minutes of arguing with the front desk they did refund our money!! I felt bad for the solo young woman at the desk that had to deal with several complaints!

Reviews.Title: “A nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: My stay at the Serene Hotel in Ocean City was great! I stayed there 4 nights with my dog and couldn't have been happier. I was really discouraged before I left after reading the reviews on this site. Only 3 out of 14 reviews were positive!!! I was wondering what I had gotten myself into and thought I was going to be staying in a dump. However, it turned out that this hotel was not how these reviewers portrayed it at all. When I called to make my reservation, the woman on the phone was very friendly, answered all my questions and mailed me a letter confirming my reservation. When I arrived, I found the staff to be just as amicable. The rooms were clean and well lit. It was quiet. I could see the ocean from my balcony. And the hotel is among many conveniences; only a block from the beach, across the street from shopping centers, gas stations, and drug stores. I couldn't have asked for a better place to stay. I must say that the other reviews were very misleading, and while the Serene is not a 4-star hotel, it's nowhere near as bad as these people made it out to be. There was one comment on another review about the pool being out front on the street. While that's probably not the most ideal spot for a pool, it did get all the afternoon sun. And when I go to the beach, I'm not looking to spend all my time by the pool anyway. This was the perfect place to stay with my dog. There were many other pets there, yet the hotel was quiet! If you're looking for a place to vacation with your pet, I recommend the Serene. I'm glad I didn't trust all the negative reviews. I would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Worst Place”
Reviews.Author: Pgk500
Reviews.Content: Its a tterrible place.The housekeepers never clean the sheets and if you dont like the room its impossible to get a refund and you have to go through lots of hassles.If you want to have a peaceful vacation dont stay at this place just to save a few bucks dont risk your entire vacation.Spend couple of hundred more and get a good place because during busys days u wont be able to find rooms in entire ocean city.My only advice dont stay at this place .

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: My Family and I Have stayed at the Serene Hotel for the last seven years. We stay there for the Firemens Convention in June. I t is very affordable. We always have great service. It is really close to the beach. It has an outside pool that is real nice.And for those of you who have a pet and just can't seem to leave your pet home, It allows them on the first floor.I would recommend this Hotel to any body.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Great place for the money. Stayed there when it was the Georgia Belle and it sucked, now under new management and they've made a lot of upgrades. Place is clean, service helpful. Going back this summer. Just a walk to the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here for the weekend we came in on a thursday night around 9:30 p.m and I was shocked (in a good way) that there was someone in the office that late at night for this time of the year. We got our room and we had a wonderful oceanview room. For the price we paid I was delighted that we had a microwave and refrigerator in our room as well.The room had a private balcony and is only a short walk to the beach. The front desk staff was wonderful. Very helpful and understanding, friendly and pleasant. We enjoyed a laugh with the desk clerk as we were getting checked in.As for some of these other reviews, I spoke with the manager and the hotel just went under new management about 3 years ago they are in the process of renovations and remodeling. If you would visit the website then you would be aware of this situation in advance and would know what to expect. The housekeeping staff was also very friendly indeed. Our rooms were cleaned and stocked with fresh linens everyday. I also think it is wonderful that they allow pets. There are only a few places that except pets and it seems like a reasonable per night rate. We were very satisfied and the management was very proffesional and curteous as well. I would definetely suggest this hotel to a friend.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place To Stay!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Serene Hotel and Suites durning Val. day., with my boyfriend. It was an very clean hotel and was a great price. They had friendly staff, and there was NUTTING WRONG WITH THE SHEETS AND ETC. They were very clean. Trust me. We even stayed on the 1st floor WHICH COME ON IS THE 'PET FLOOR'. So of course there isnt new flooring in there, but it was still very clean. And as for pet lovers like my self you would want to take your "babies" with you. And this was the oly hotel I could find that allow pets. I would tell anyone to stay there!
